duties_responsibilities.duty: Utilize SAP Logistics Execution to map and optimize industry's logistical processes.
Integrate third-party logistics and maintain advance level proficiency in SAP delivery note creation and processing.
Understand basic level technical aspects to interpret ABAP code and perform debugging activities.
Coordinate with offshore resources and work in CST timezone to ensure effective logistics execution.
Demonstrate expertise in SDLC and ensure delivery of artifacts in a timely manner.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or related field (Master's preferred)
